```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(dittoSeq)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
merged = readRDS("merged_seurat_object.rds")
merged = subset(merged, subset=nCount_RNA > 500 % percent.mt < 20)
merged = SCTransform(merged)
merged = RunPCA(merged)
merged = RunUMAP(merged, dims=1:20)
merged = FindNeighbors(merged, dims=1:20)
merged = FindClusters(merged, algorithm=4, resolution=0.3)
merged = FindClusters(merged, algorithm=4, resolution=0.4)
merged = FindClusters(merged, algorithm=4, resolution=0.6)
```
